评论详情: The fabric is soft and a little stretchy! It looks exactly how it looks in the picture. The size is on point, and all the little chains and pockets are seamlessly beautiful! I hope my boyfriend loves them!

was expecting a button of some sort but was very surprised with the stretchy waistband. they’re very lightweight, easy to breathe in and super comfy. the stretch gives it that extra plus for me because i like to move in clothing.

The texture is nice but it's very snug on me I have big thighs and it pretty much hugged everything in an uncomfortable way. And doesn't look as baggy as I'd hope I even orded a size up for it just to be uncomfortable

These shorts fit well and the fabric is of decent quality and has huge pockets. The chains attached are rather cheap and break easily, but that's kind of to be expected at this price point. I'm 5'4 and 200 lbs and got the XL. The shorts are nice and long and go down to my knees.
My child loves them, they’re a great fit. Would definitely buy again, they’re holding up great in the wash/dryer as well.

These shorts are very comfortable. They fit perfectly, and are really lightweight and allow air to flow up the legs. They look amazing, and i will definitely be wearing these a lot. The chain mixed with my spatial awareness issues causes a few problems, but that's on me. 10/10 would recommend these.
Good material, great fit and loved by my picky teen.
Love these pants I recommend them for sure. The chain fell off but apart from that I reccomend it.
Bin Größe S und M passt mir perfekt. Hab ich mir schon gedacht, deshalb gleich größer genommen
Mit dem Gummibind kann man sich bedenkenlos ne Nummer größer gönnen. Ich find die Hose fantastisch! Auch von der Länge her echt gut! Ich kann sie empfehlen!

I wear these ALL THE TIME!!! 😄 They fit so well, are quite light, look AMAZING and are of great quality 👍🏼😁 The pockets aren't the most fitting if you are planning on not bringing a bag etc. But I like to overlook that with the fact that these have FOUR POCKETS!!!! 😃
